question: R Vinay Kumar has announced his retirement from which sports?
explanation:
Indian Cricketer R Vinay Kumar has recently announced his retirement. He is a versatile sports person belonging to Karnataka state.
He has represented the Indian Cricket Team in 1 test, 31 ODIs and 9 T20I matches. Also, he had been active in IPL for Royal challengers Bangalore and Kolkata Knight Riders.
